ygData.subject: RE: Pissed off pottery buffs? I seem to be unaffected
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it was fun while it lasted.  I was able to buy a Dragoon Dirk, a Gossimer Robe, and all of my spells to date via pottery. I am level 17 now, so the money
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it was fun while it lasted. I was able to buy a Dragoon Dirk, a
Gossimer Robe, and all of my spells to date via pottery. I am level 17 now,
so the money is rolling in good enough from loot that I can almost afford to
give up pottery, but still - it was nice to be able to make money without
risk.

I think we all knew (but didn't want to accept) that the remainder of trade
skills were going to be nerfed when they nerfed brewing. I honestly can't
believe that they waited this long....

Buying hordes of sketches isn't going to be the answer either - since they
max you can buy and horde is 80 (if you have 10 position containers in the
bank) stacks of 20, how long can that last someone???

I think tonight calls for one last "run" on pottery - but I can only imagine
how long the lines are going to be at the wheel...

-----Original Message-----
From: Z.M. Kulik [mailto:direhawk@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 6:48 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Pissed off pottery buffs? I seem to be
unaffected


From: "Z.M. Kulik" <direhawk@...>

The patch will come on tuesday, so you better stock up on pie tin
sketches.(like i did) :)
